description: It indicates that zxAnIfInBandwidthUsingRatio exceeds the threshold
zxAnIfInBandwidthUsingThresh.

event.Summary: In-bandwidth using ratio ($v1) exceeded the threshold ($v2)

description: An estimate of the interface's current received bandwidth using
ratio.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-INTERFACE-STATS-MIB::zxAnIfInBandwidthUsingRatio

description: The threshold of zxAnIfInBandwidthUsingRatio.
When zxAnIfInBandwidthUsingRatio exceeds this threshold
the zxAnIfInBwUsingThreshExceedAlm trap should be generated.
If zxAnIfInBandwidthUsingRatio always exceeds the threshold
only one zxAnIfInBwUsingThreshExceedAlm trap should be sent.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-INTERFACE-STATS-MIB::zxAnIfInBandwidthUsingThresh

description: The high accuracy value of zxAnIfInBandwidthUsingRatio.
variables.name: ZTE-AN-INTERFACE-STATS-MIB::zxAnIfInBandwidthUsingRatioHa

description: It indicates that zxAnIfInBandwidthUsingRatio is below the
threshold zxAnIfInBandwidthUsingThresh.
An estimate of the interface's current received bandwidth using
ratio.

description: It indicates that zxAnIfOutBandwidthUsingRatio exceeds the
